metadata.title: CVE-2022-27145 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: GPAC mp4box 1.1.0-DEV-rev1727-g8be34973d-master has a stack-overflowvulnerability in function gf_isom_get_sample_for_movie_time of mp4box.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
